import React from 'react' import "./Signup.scss" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Signup = () => { const handleKeyDown = (event)=>{ const keyCode = event.keyCode || event.which; if(keyCode<48||keyCode>57){ event.preventDefault(); } }; return (
